name: kpos
description: KPOS is a full-stack web application built with Django and PostgreSQL to help small businesses manage sales, cash flow, inventory, and basic accounting. It features invoice generation, stock tracking, and financial reports â€” all in a simple, efficient interface designed for everyday use.

name: kimbea
description: Kimbea is a scalable, full-featured e-commerce platform I developed to support a wide product catalog and high user concurrency. Built with a Django backend and PostgreSQL for data integrity and performance, the platform features user authentication, advanced product filtering, cart and order management, and secure payment integration.

name: dj-shop-cart
description: A simple and flexible cart manager for your django projects.

name: klearn
description: Klearn is a Django-based e-learning platform that provides a comprehensive set of tools for creating, managing, and delivering online courses. It offers features such as user authentication, course management, content creation, and analytics.

name: fleetfind
description: A lightweight Django package that empowers you to seamlessly search across multiple models in your Django projects.
